content: द्विष् {c2c} <ab>U.</ab> (द्वेष्टि, द्विष्टे; द्विष्ट) To hate, dislike, be hostile towards; न द्वेक्षि यज्जनमतस्त्वमजातशत्रुः <ls>Ve. 3. 13</ls>; <ls>Bg. 2. 57</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">18. 10</ls>; <ls>Bk. 17. 61</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">18. 9</ls>; रम्यं द्वेष्टि <ls>Ś. 6. 4.</ls> (Prepositions like प्र, वि and सं are prefixed to this root without any change of meaning.)

द्विष् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Hostile, hating, inimical. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} An enemy; रंभ्रान्बेषणदक्षाणां द्विषामामिषतां ययौ <ls>R. 12. 11</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 45</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 70.</ls> {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> Hostility.
